medical_history.chief_complaint: Fatigue, loss of appetite, and occasional epigastric pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began approximately 1 month ago, worsening in the past week. Patient developed a fever of 101.4 two days prior to presentation, accompanied by shaking chills. He had little to no appetite in the last week and reports feeling overall fatigued and unwell.
